PZ2·65759 | Mathas, Fiend Seeker | Card Text | Paragraph 1
PZ2·65759 | Mathas, Fiend Seeker | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your end step, put a bounty counter on target creature an opponent controls. For as long as that creature has a bounty counter on it, it has "When this creature dies, each opponent draws a card and gains 2 life."
trans-unit.target: At the beginning of your end step, put a bounty counter on target creature an opponent controls. For as long as that creature has a bounty counter on it, it has "When this creature dies, each opponent draws a card and gains 2 life."

PZ2·65761 | Kheru Mind-Eater | Card Text | Paragraph 1
PZ2·65761 | Kheru Mind-Eater | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a player, that player exiles a card from their hand face down.
trans-unit.target: Whenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a player, that player exiles a card from their hand face down.

trans-unit.resname: PZ2·65761 | Kheru Mind-Eater | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: You may look at cards exiled with CARDNAME, and you may play lands and cast spells from among those cards.
trans-unit.target: You may look at cards exiled with CARDNAME, and you may play lands and cast spells from among those cards.

PZ2·65763 | Kess, Dissident Mage | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Once during each of your turns, you may cast an instant or sorcery spell from your graveyard. If a spell cast this way would be put into your graveyard, exile it instead.
trans-unit.target: Once during each of your turns, you may cast an instant or sorcery spell from your graveyard. If a spell cast this way would be put into your graveyard, exile it instead.

PZ2·65765 | Curse of Vitality | Card Text | Paragraph 2

trans-unit.resname: PZ2·65771 | Nazahn, Revered Bladesmith | Card Name
PZ2·65771 | Nazahn, Revered Bladesmith | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, search your library for an Equipment card and reveal it. If you reveal a card named Hammer of Nazahn this way, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put that card into your hand. Then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, search your library for an Equipment card and reveal it. If you reveal a card named Hammer of Nazahn this way, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put that card into your hand. Then shuffle.
